summary: This document appears to be an internal listing of committee members and their roles within Deutsche Bank, specifically related to its Americas operations. It includes titles, names, and legal entities associated with each member, indicating a structured governance framework within the bank.

persons.name: Stuart Clarke
persons.context: Stuart Clarke is identified as the Chief Operating Officer for the Americas and serves as the Chairman of the committee.

persons.name: Steven Ekert
persons.context: Steven Ekert holds the position of Chief Risk Officer for the Americas and is the Vice Chairman of the committee.

persons.name: Steven Reich
persons.context: Steven Reich is listed as the General Legal Counsel for the Americas.

persons.name: Francis Kelly
persons.context: Francis Kelly is the Global Coordinator for Public Affairs and Head of Government Relations & Public Affairs for North & Latin America.

persons.name: Eric Smith
persons.context: Eric Smith is identified as the Chief Financial Officer for the Americas.

persons.name: Jan Ford
persons.context: Jan Ford serves as the Head of Compliance for the Americas.

persons.name: Jan Bornebusch
persons.context: Jan Bornebusch is the Head of Anti-Financial Crime for the Americas.

persons.name: Jonathan Hummel
persons.role: Head of Funds, Clearinghouses & Exchanges - CRM
persons.context: Jonathan Hummel is identified as the Head of Funds, Clearinghouses & Exchanges within Deutsche Bank.

persons.name: Carol Saracco
persons.context: Carol Saracco is the Secretary and Head of Regional Corporate Governance for the Americas.

keyFacts: The document lists various committee members and their roles within Deutsche Bank's Americas operations.
It includes titles such as Chairman, Vice Chairman, General Legal Counsel, and various department heads.
All individuals listed are associated with Deutsche Bank entities in the United States.
